Name: Picture Perfect
About the game: THE STORY WARNING TABOO 18+: You are a photographer dad who is close with your three daughters. There's 18 year-old Miracle who is so shy and introverted she won't leave the house without you., 20 year-old Sasha who dreams of starring on Broadway. And 22 year-old Paris who dropped out of college to mooch off you once more. Ever since the girls' mother abandoned you and them several years ago, you've had a tough time managing everything, to say the least. You're in danger of losing the house, though you keep it a secret from the trio of girls. Now it's your job to help our protagonist change his desolate fate! You'll help him make choices and hopefully have a little fun along the way =] THE GAME PLAY In Picture Perfect, you play as the main character and take control of all the decision-making, such as deciding to be stricter on a character or be more understanding. You have full control of how you play, and which characters you'll be spending time with. But be careful! Rejecting to spend time with a character or choosing the wrong choices may disable you from their route, and all future content with them because most choices have hidden points that you gain or lose! FEATURES - Name your own characters - Define the relationship within the game - Select choices that shape the story you want - Replay the game and choose different choices to access all content - Colorful collection of music while you play
